Address.value: 6340 SEQUENCE DRIVE, SAN DIEGO, California, 92121, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: DexCom Inc designs and commercializes continuous glucose monitoring systems for diabetics. CGM systems serve as an alternative to the traditional blood glucose meter process, and the company is evolving its CGM systems to include the disposable sensor and the durable receiver.
